SELECT U.STATS_DATE, U.POST_NUM, P.TITLE, U.COUNTER FROM POST P INNER JOIN
(SELECT STATS_DATE, POST_NUM, COUNTER FROM STATS UNION SELECT SYSDATE AS STATS_DATE, P.POST_NUM, NVL(P.COUNTER - S.COUNTER, P.COUNTER) AS COUNTER FROM POST P LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT STATS_DATE, POST_NUM, COUNTER FROM STATS WHERE STATS_DATE = SYSDATE - 1) S ON P.POST_NUM = S.POST_NUM) U
ON P.POST_NUM = U.POST_NUM
WHERE U.STATS_DATE = TO_DATE(${statsDate},'YYYYMMDD')
